 Contributors
 ============

 pmxbot was originally conceived and written by Jamie Turner (jamwt).

 The web interface and substantial improvements were made by Chris
 Mulligan (chmullig).

 Other substantial contributors include:

 - Shoemaker (mrshoe)
 - Chris Perry (cperry)
 - Jason R. Coombs <Jason.Coombs@YouGov.net>

If you believe your name belongs here, but you don't see it, please don't
hesitate to contact the maintainer.
